body:
Comment 1: 
It doesn't show up because exp/4s is package main, and
since you can't import package main it's not terribly useful.
The real bug might be that http://golang.org/pkg/exp/4s/
displays documentation.  It's certainly wrong about the
import "exp/4s" suggestion.

Regardless of where the bug is, I agree they should be consistent.
_Owner changed to **g...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
